thread.title: Video of Barack Obama and Michelle Obama on Vacation
thread.title_full: Video of Barack Obama and Michelle Obama on Vacation

author: Lauren Boyer
title: Video of Barack Obama and Michelle Obama on Vacation
text:
Cancel 
You've never seen Barack and Michelle Obama like this before. 
In a video that's gone viral on Twitter, the couple was spotted at the beach wearing sunglasses and flip-flops – just like other beach goers. Obama's on vacation with the hat backwards. He's never coming back. pic.twitter.com/RUakcwwgtT — Philip Lewis (@Phil_Lewis_) February 1, 2017 
Waving at passersby, the former president sported a backwards cap, while the former first lady wore shorts, a beach coverup and a hat, with her hair in pigtails. 
After President Donald Trump's inauguration, the couple headed to the British Virgin Islands – specifically, Necker Island – for some much needed relaxation. 
[ PHOTOS: Obama Behind the Scenes ] 
The former president previewed these post-presidency plans during a town hall in October. 
“I am going to sleep for two weeks and then I am going to take Michelle on a very nice vacation," he said, according to TIME. Lauren Boyer Social Media Editor 
Lauren Boyer is Social Media Editor at U.S. News & World Report. Follow her on Twitter , connect with her on LinkedIn or reach her at lboyer@usnews.com. Recommended Articles
